Derivation.Formula: If ( ( Inserting OR Updating ) AND ( GOVT_BRN_CD IS NULL ) ) Then $value = AMSSecurity.getDefOrgWildCard( AMSSecurity.GOVT_BRN_CD_IDX ) End If
If ( ( Inserting OR Updating ) AND ( CAB_CD IS NULL ) ) Then $value = AMSSecurity.getDefOrgWildCard( AMSSecurity.CAB_CD_IDX ) End If
If ( ( Inserting OR Updating ) AND ( DEPT_CD IS NULL ) ) Then $value = AMSSecurity.getDefOrgWildCard( AMSSecurity.DEPT_CD_IDX ) End If
If ( ( Inserting OR Updating ) AND ( DIV_CD IS NULL ) ) Then $value = AMSSecurity.getDefOrgWildCard( AMSSecurity.DIV_CD_IDX ) End If
If ( ( Inserting OR Updating ) AND ( GP_CD IS NULL ) ) Then $value = AMSSecurity.getDefOrgWildCard( AMSSecurity.GP_CD_IDX ) End If
If ( ( Inserting OR Updating ) AND ( SECT_CD IS NULL ) ) Then $value = AMSSecurity.getDefOrgWildCard( AMSSecurity.SECT_CD_IDX ) End If
If ( ( Inserting OR Updating ) AND ( DSTC_CD IS NULL ) ) Then $value = AMSSecurity.getDefOrgWildCard( AMSSecurity.DSTC_CD_IDX ) End If
If ( ( Inserting OR Updating ) AND ( BUR_CD IS NULL ) ) Then $value = AMSSecurity.getDefOrgWildCard( AMSSecurity.BUR_CD_IDX ) End If
If ( ( Inserting OR Updating ) AND ( UNIT_CD IS NULL ) ) Then $value = AMSSecurity.getDefOrgWildCard( AMSSecurity.UNIT_CD_IDX ) End If
AMSSecurity.formCombOrgCode( GOVT_BRN_CD, CAB_CD, DEPT_CD, DIV_CD, GP_CD, SECT_CD, DSTC_CD, BUR_CD, UNIT_CD )

Action.Name: CheckNotificationOnlyInformation
Action.Description: For each approval level, the notification-only attributes (NOTIF_WO_RTE_FL_x, NOTIF_WO_ID_x, NOTIF_WO_ID_TYP_x, and NOTIF_WO_CMNT_x) must be set consistently with or without "data."

Action.Name: CheckAssigneeField
Action.Description: Checks validations if Assigneed Field and Assignee ID are populate than raise Exception and Assignee Field and Assignee IS Role field is checked than raise Exception.

Constraint.Name: CheckDocCtrlAprvSng
Constraint.Condition: ( Inserting OR Updating ) AND ( isChanged('APRV_SNG_FL') = true AND getOldAPRV_SNG_FL() = true)
